page.title: 04A Day In My Life
page.content: Friday in the morning, Mom has to come upstairs to wake me up. I have a stretch and a yawn, then I go downstairs in my nightshirt and my breakfast is waiting for me. I have weetabix crunched up and a cup of tea. Then I go to the toilet, get dressed and put deodorant on. I open my curtains and go into the bathroom where I brush my teeth and have a wash. After that I go back into my bedroom, put my earrings in and put my shoes on.I go downstairs, get my bag, sandwiches and pop, pick up my bus fare and set off to catch the bus to school in Hednesford. When I get home from school I watch the telly for a bit, then I call for my mates and play cricket. When the chip van comes we have to get the money off mom for the chips and eat them in the house. After we have had our chips we go to bed.
